subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: DeJuan Blair had 23 points and a career-high 22 rebounds, and No. 3 Pittsburgh rallied from a rare halftime deficit to beat Notre Dame, 93-80, on Saturday in Pittsburgh.
snippet: DeJuan Blair had 23 points and a career-high 22 rebounds, and No. 3 Pittsburgh rallied from a rare halftime deficit to beat Notre Dame, 93-80, on Saturday in Pittsburgh.
